abstract: Joint Commission on Public Ethics, tasked with going after government corruption in New York State, appoints Seth Agata, former aid to Gov Andrew M Cuomo as its director.
lead_paragraph: For the third time, the state’s Joint Commission on Public Ethics has chosen a person with close ties to the governor as its leader.

headline.main: New York Ethics Board Picks Ex-Cuomo Aide as Director
headline.print_headline: State Ethics Board  Picks New Director

snippet: For the third time, the state’s Joint Commission on Public Ethics has chosen a person with close ties to the governor as its leader.
